biography_text: SEWELL, Terri, a Representative from Alabama; born in Huntsville, Madison County, Ala., January 1, 1965; graduated from Selma High School, Selma, Ala., 1982; A.B., Princeton University, Princeton, N.J., 1986; M.A., Oxford University, Oxford, England, 1988; J.D., Harvard University, Cambridge, Mass., 1992; lawyer, private practice; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Twelfth and to the three succeeding Congresses (January 3, 2011-present).
